EmailTemplate.subject: Now Available: Subscription Platform Training for Sales
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Team,
Business Operations is pleased to announce that the Subscription Platform Training for Sales <https://pivotalfield.biglms.com/courses/PFS/SSP100/VWZ/about> is now available.
This training module is a single course composed of six separate chapters that users can select/view individually. There is also a 10 question quiz to test your knowledge. It is mandatory that Field Sales complete this course and quiz by August 31st. Your progress will be tracked by management weekly. Details below:
Unit 1: Overview (8 min) Unit 2: Opportunity (9 min) Unit 3: Quote (18 min) Unit 4: Quote Approvals (5 min) Unit 5: Sending Quote to Order Management (6 min) Unit 6: 360 Sync (10 min) Test Your Knowledge (10 questions)
Thank you,
Greg Stroud Vice President, Field Business Operations
